title: [Question]Food at girls hostel Unit 2
content: How often do they serve non veg/eggs? And if it’s not regular, how do you guys manage to hit your daily protein goals outside the mess?

comments.body:
I used to take whey protein and had an egg boiler, you can even try all the new protein milkshakes or protein lassi from Amul or other brands. 
Don’t know about the frequency of non-veg in girls hostel .
Oh okay, thank you so much.
